title: Thank You For Helping Me Raise My Daughter
description:
As she drives to her daughter's wedding weekend, Kate calls to thank Dr. Laura for guiding her through motherhood and helping the family get to this happy milestone. - Dr. Laura: "Good parenting has its rewards."

What Dr. Laura parenting advice has most helped you? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
